<lang code="WSButton_PreviousYear_Text" value="<<" />
<lang code="ScriptError_ClosingXMLNotAtEnd" value="The closing tag can only be on the last line." />
<lang code="ScriptError_OpeningXMLNotAtStart" value="The opening tag can only be on the first line." />
<lang code="ScriptError_XMLNotMatching" value="You must specify both, or none, of the and tags." />
